title: Project Natal (E3 presentation) face
content:
Howdy all, love the site. I am a huge fan of both typography AND Drupal, so this is like a little slice of heaven for me… right! on to it:

M$ just revealed another piece of potential vaporware dubbed Project Natal. Who cares? Well, check out the typeface used in the presentation. I could swear I’ve seen it before, but I am stumped. Please feel free to laugh and point.

If you know it, spill the beans! I think it’s pretty hot in an awkward sort of way.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607102050im_/http:/typophile.com/files/proj-natal-typeface_3949.png)
author: ballertastic

comments.content: If you dig awkward faces that are similar to DIN, check [Scout](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607102050/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/families/scout/).
